prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Guitar, Reed, Piano, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Bass, Guitar, Reed, and Piano, but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Drums, Bass, Guitar, Reed, and Piano, with no Synth Pad.
